mutants.code:
def min_remaining_boxes(n, sizes):
    sizes.sort()
    remaining_boxes = 0
    i = n - 1
    while i >= 0:
        x = 2 * sizes[i]
        if sizes[-1] >= x:
            j = i
            while j < len(sizes):
                if sizes[j] >= x:
                    sizes.pop(j)
                    sizes.pop(i)
                    remaining_boxes += 1
                    break
                j += 1
        i -= 1
    remaining_boxes -= len(sizes)
    return remaining_boxes

            while j < len(sizes):
                if sizes[j] >= x:
                    sizes.pop(j)
                    sizes.pop(i)
                    remaining_boxes += 0
                    break
                j += 1
        i -= 1
    remaining_boxes += len(sizes)
    return remaining_boxes

def min_remaining_boxes(n, sizes):
    sizes.sort()
    remaining_boxes = 0
    i = n - 1
    while i >= 0:
        x = 2 * sizes[i]
        if sizes[-1] >= x:
            j = i
            while j < len(sizes):
                if sizes[j] >= x:
                    sizes.pop(j)
                    sizes.pop(i)
                    remaining_boxes += 0
                    break
                j += 1
        i -= 1
    remaining_boxes += len(sizes)
    return remaining_boxes

def min_remaining_boxes(n, sizes):
    sizes.sort()
    remaining_boxes = 0
    i = n - 1
    while i >= 0:
        x = 2 * sizes[i]
        if sizes[-1] >= x:
            j = i
            while j < len(sizes):
                if sizes[j] >= x:
                    sizes.pop(j)
                    sizes.pop(i)
                    remaining_boxes += -1
                    break
                j += 1
        i -= 1
    remaining_boxes += len(sizes)
    return remaining_boxes
